article:
{{Multiple issues|orphan = February 2012|peacock = November 2010|

}}

'Closed GmbH' is a German fashion brand which produces jeans and other clothes
since 1978. Today the company is based in Hamburg and has three directing
managers: Gordon Giers, Til Nadler and Hans Redlefsen. In 2009 Closed GmbH has
140 members of staff. Besides in Germany, Closed products are available mostly
in Italy, France, the Netherlands, Belgium, Great Britain, Russia and the USA.
